member.name: SHNAMEMAPPING
member.summary: Contains the old and new path names for each file that was moved, copied, or renamed by the function.

member.name: SHNAMEMAPPING.pszOldPath
member.summary: The address of a character buffer that contains the old path name.

member.name: SHNAMEMAPPING.pszNewPath
member.summary: The address of a character buffer that contains the new path name.

member.name: SHNAMEMAPPING.cchOldPath
member.summary: The number of characters in pszOldPath.

member.name: SHNAMEMAPPING.cchNewPath
member.summary: The number of characters in pszNewPath.
